job.title: Servicenow Developer
job.description: <p><strong>Role: ServiceNow Developer</strong></p><p><strong>Location: 100% Remote</strong></p><p><strong>Contract Duration: 6 Months</strong></p><p><br></p><p><strong>Requirements:</strong></p><ul><li>Experienced ServiceNow developers</li><li>Ability to create complex workflows using flow designer</li><li>Ability to create forms with automation fulfillment</li><li>Strong knowledge and understanding of ServiceNow data model and tables, especially for incident, change and CMDB</li><li>Knowledge of SN APIs</li><li>Network, server, or INF knowledge and experience is a ‘plus’ but not required</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>Responsibilities:</strong></p><ul><li>Replace work order templates using flow designer</li><li>Develop forms (including documentation)</li><li>Consult and help in development of the appropriate rest API to replace the ~100 automations across FI that use BMC ticket API</li><li>Consult other citizen developers with guardrails and solutions</li></ul><p></p>
